idea:
Evergreen Club is a platform specially curated to build an online community for seniors.

The idea is to LIVE!

LEARN new things and rekindle old hobbies by participating in live sessions.

INTERACT with like-minded people by using social features.

VIEW the repository of your favorite events and workshops any time you want.

ENGAGE with a social community to learn new things and have fun
name: EVERGREEN COMMUNITY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our firm is rendering Computer AMC Service. These services are completed at affordable cost. This service is rendered by professionals who have affluent industry practice and expertise. Additionally, this service is extensively admired in the market for their timely implementation.
name: Ternion Tech

idea: MW Mart, an initiative by The MW Group- App, which is made available on Playstore, from which you can buy groceries, daily consumable products online, of brands known to you. If a brand you need is currently not available on our Mart, on your special request it will be made available. This service is currently available only for Thane district and will soon be made open to entire Maharashtra. Covid-19 has put a strain on our income, In such situation, earning for daily consumable products and groceries has become difficult. MW Mart helps you to earn your groceries and daily products at your door steps with Income opportunity upto Rs.20,000+ per month. Just send your referral Code to your near & dears to earn referral profit along with Groceries for self-use at doorstep. The MW Group has started this initiative during this Pandemic under the tagline as MWMART- Rozi bhi... Roti bhi.... under no loss, no profit to Company.
name: MW mart

idea: The Sanwhich Hub, Is A Cloud Kitchen Started By Savings Of Personal
name: The Sandwhich Hub

idea:
The Little Green we wants to grow more than just fresh and nutritious food. We want to create a sustainable future for farming and feed the world in a way that is good for both people and planet.

By creating hyper-local urban farms we are creating a complete transparent supply chain with low-carbon footprint and our growing technique helps us save 95% water yet grow 30x compared to traditional farms
name: The Little Green

idea: uKnowva is a 360-degree solution for your everyday business requirements like people management, customer servicing, invoicing and corporate collaboration. Built keeping mobility in mind.
name: Uknowva Softwares Private Limited

idea: We are making India’s first social media platform for creative intellectual users while also helping the diminishing presence of independent bookstores. Independent bookstores have been pushed to the margins since the arrival of the digital MNC’s which have dominated the entire market. The bookstores which have resorted to digital spaces have been left with marginal revenues and huge losses, rendering some of them even unviable for business. It combines an e-commerce platform for selling the physical books with a safe social place for users to reach out to each other in new, ingenious ways.
name: LIEPER BOOKS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Contacare Pharma Pvt Ltd has filed an industrial Entreprenuers Memorandum for setting up a new project for Ophthalmic pharmaceuticals. CONTACARE PHARMA PRIVATE LIMITED going to the manufacturing of all types of Ophthalmic solutions, eye drops, and ophthalmic diagnostic strips for export as well as domestic markets.
name: CONTACARE PHARMA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
